verses.roman:
tabe sanātana prabhura caraṇe dhariyā
punarapi kahe kichu vinaya kariyā

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; sanātana—Sanātana Gosvāmī; prabhura caraṇe dhariyā—catching the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; punarapi—again; kahe—says; kichu—something; vinaya kariyā—with great humility.
translation: Thereafter, Sanātana Gosvāmī clasped the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu and humbly submitted the following petition.
